name: Happy Yak Moroccan Couscous and Lentils
description: Fluffy couscous infused with Moroccan spices, combined with protein-rich red lentils, sweet raisins and apricots, finished with the toothsome crunch of lightly toasted slivered almonds.Ingredients: couscous (wheat), red lentils, toasted slivered almonds, chopped dried apricots (sulphites), powdered vegetable broth [maltodextrin, yeast extract, dehydrated vegetables (tomato, onion, garlic), salt, modified corn starch, spices, sugar, hydrogenated soy oil, caramel, citric acid, guar gum, xanthan gum], raisins (sulphites), dried onion flakes, spices, dried parsley, garlic powder.May contain: nut, peanuts, egg, fish, sea food, mustard and milk.
